name: Diced!
description:
A game all about rolling the dice. Well, sort of. There's some dicing in it I suppose. ;)

Drag and drop different ingredients onto pots and pans to create all kinds of dishes! Make sure not to burn your food though! Time your clicks right to create the most perfectly cooked piece of digital chicken you've ever seen.

Keep and eye out for kitchen upgrades every few recipes, they're super helpful!

Can you get an S rank?
